thread.title: Ground News - Two skiers die in the French Alps buried by an avalanche that could be caused
thread.title_full: Ground News - Two skiers die in the French Alps buried by an avalanche that could be caused

author: La Vanguardia
title: Ground News - Two skiers die in the French Alps buried by an avalanche that could be caused
text:
Summary by La Vanguardia Two people were killed after an avalanche broke out in the town of Saint-Gervais-Les-Bains, in Haute-Savoie, as reported by TF1. A group of skiers, consisting of an instructor and five students, were trapped in an avalanche that occurred early this Thursday afternoon, three people from the group were buried in the snow: the ski instructor and two other people, the latter of whom were found dead by emergency teams. Keep reading... Share menu More
